name: updateCustomFieldConfiguration
description:
Update the configuration for contexts of a custom field created by a [Forge app](https://developer.atlassian.com/platform/forge/).

**[Permissions](#permissions) required:** *Administer Jira* [global permission](https://confluence.atlassian.com/x/x4dKLg). Jira permissions are not required for the Forge app that created the custom field.

fieldIdOrKey.description: The ID or key of the custom field, for example `customfield_10000`.

CustomFieldConfigurations.description: Details of configurations for a custom field.

configurations.description: The list of custom field configuration details.

ContextualConfiguration.description: Details of the contextual configuration for a custom field.

fieldContextId.description: The ID of the field context the configuration is associated with.
